content:
Hey @T-compiler!

Could y'all take a look at <https://hackmd.io/3eG6OZWHRbSMxoRxzwNhGQ?view> and make sure any ideas for Rust 2021 that have come up are in there? If there's tracking issues or other related things, that's great. But even just incomplete ideas should go there so we don't forget to investigate them. Don't worry about structure/issue numbers/etc for now. Right now it's more like a brainstorm document where we're just collecting ideas to get a bit of an overview.

Maybe something for the agenda of the next meeting?

Thanks!

(Please put any discussion of 2021 changes to #edition! Thanks!)

Jonas Schievink said:

The aliases could only be removed on an edition boundary

what perfect timing :laughing:
